Recap: Gigi takes Shane to the gym and Cristian works with him. But not long after, Jack Manning's friend calls him to inform him that Shane is pumping iron. Jack lies to find an excuse to go there behind his mom's back and harasses Shane. But Shane drops a dumbbell on Jack's foot and hurts him get the others to laugh and give Jack a taste of his own medicine. John and Brody go to Todd's in search of Marty and baby Liam. But they are already gone when Todd takes Marty to board the plane to reunite with Patrick. She hesitates, wanting to admit to John that he is Liam's father instead of Brody. Unknown to them, original Todd is riding in the plane on the way to Llanview overhear and seeing everything. Brody and John find baby Liam with Tomas but have no proof that he knows where Marty is. Todd finally persuades Marty to board the flight. But we can only guess what will happen next.
